::DarkMouse::

She turned towards Paralysis. "Yeah I am."  She followed him.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Black Aracnia, along with Aerostreak, Grappler, Tarantulas, 
Guantix, and 
> the three Maximal prisoners rest inside the safety of the bunker. 
Aracnia 
> hopes that Atma, Solo, Venomous, and the others get back soon.
> 
>     Paralysis begins to head out when he turns to Darkmouse. "So, 
are you 
> ready to go or what?"
> 
>     Megatron had done it. At long last the Autobots would be 
destroyed....as 
> would all the transformers on the planet, including his body. But 
it was a 
> small sacrifice if that ment the Decepticons would be destroyed. 
His plan, 
> once in control of the Armada, would be to completely obliterate 
the planet, 
> the transformers, Predacons included, and humans. As for the 
> Decepticons.....if Aracnia didnt hand them over then that would 
complicate 
> things. But he was sure that one fraction would bring them to him 
if that 
> ment that they could be spared. The bloodshed would be great, but 
it would be 
> worth it.
